long_description: With a lightweight carbon frame and reliable Shimano 105 and Ultegra components, the 20-speed Diamondback Century 4 combines race-ready performance and comfortable geometry. Carbon frame is designed to provide excellent handling, delivering a lightweight, strong and responsive platform for maximum efficiency. Full-carbon fork with tapered carbon steerer uses continuous fibers to maximize strength, stiffness and handling response, all with little weight penalty. Shimano 105 shifters and front derailleur with an Ultegra rear derailleur offer snappy, super-crisp shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations. FSA Gossamer Pro Compact crankset with 50/34 chainrings is paired with a 12-30 cassette for a wide range of gearing for easy climbs and speed on the flats. Shimano RS-1 wheels are equipped with Michelin Dynamic Sport tires to supply good all-around performance. Please note that this bike includes composite test pedals: additional pedals sold separately. Specs on the Diamondback Century 4 Bike are subject to change.
short_description: With a lightweight carbon frame and reliable Shimano 105 and Ultegra components, the 20-speed Diamondback Century 4 combines race-ready performance and comfortable geometry.
